questions.question: Which sentence contains an action verb?
questions.explanation: "Run" is an action verb describing what "they" do.

questions.question: Identify the action verb in the sentence: "She sings beautifully."
questions.explanation: "Sings" is the action verb describing what "she" does.

questions.question: In the sentence "The baby appears happy," the verb "appears" is the verb.
questions.explanation: "Appears" is the verb describing the state of appearing happy.

questions.question: In the sentence "He talks loudly," the verb "talks" is an action verb.
questions.explanation: "Talks" is an action verb describing the action "he" performs.

questions.question: We _____ a movie last night.
questions.explanation: The verb "watched" indicates the action performed on the movie.

questions.question: She ____ a letter to her friend every month.
questions.explanation: "Writes" is an action verb describing the action she performs every month.

questions.question: Identify the verb in the sentence: "The flowers bloom in the spring."
questions.explanation: "Bloom" is the main verb describing the action taken by the flowers.

questions.question: The verb "hard" in the sentence "She studies hard every night" is an action verb.
questions.explanation: The word "hard" in that sentence is not a verb. It's an adverb. "Studies" is an action verb describing the action "she" performs.

questions.question: He ____ the lawn every weekend.
questions.explanation: "Mows" is an action verb describing the action he performs every weekend.

questions.question: In the sentence "They practise every weekend," the verb "practise" is an action verb.
questions.explanation: "Practise" is an action verb describing the action "they" perform.

questions.question: “Speak,” “Ring” and “Beautiful” are verbs.
questions.explanation: Among the given words "Speak," "Ring," and "Beautiful," only the first two are verbs, while "Beautiful" is an adjective.

questions.question: Identify the action verb in this sentence: "The teacher explains the lesson clearly."
questions.explanation: "Explains" is the action verb describing what the teacher does.

questions.question: Identify the verb in the sentence: "The students completed their assignments."
questions.explanation: "Completed" is the verb describing the action taken by the students.

questions.question: Which sentence uses "drive" as an action verb?
questions.explanation: "Drive" is used as an action verb describing the action of operating a vehicle.

questions.question: Identify the verb in the sentence: "The cat sleeps on the windowsill."
questions.explanation: "Sleeps" is the verb describing what the cat does.

questions.question: Identify the action verb in the sentence: "The chef prepares the meal."
questions.explanation: "Prepares" is the action verb describing what the chef does.

questions.question: He _____ his homework diligently.
questions.explanation: This is the action verb for what he did to his homework.

questions.question: The children ____ in the park every afternoon.
questions.explanation: "Run" is an action verb describing what the children do in the park.

questions.question: In the sentence "The musician plays the guitar," the verb "musician" is an action verb.
questions.explanation: “Musician” is not a verb. "Plays" is an action verb describing what the musician does. It indicates the action of playing the guitar.

questions.question: Fill in the blank with the appropriate verb: Can you please ______ the attendance register?
questions.explanation: The correct sentence is: Can you please pass the attendance register? “Pass” accurately reflects the action you're requesting - transferring the attendance register to someone else.
